tasks.label: Stop static server (8081)
args: $lines = netstat -ano | Select-String ':8081'; $procIds = @(); foreach($line in $lines){ $parts = ($line.ToString() -split '\s+') | Where-Object { $_ }; if($parts.Length -ge 5 -and $parts[3] -eq 'LISTENING'){ $procIds += $parts[4] } }; $procIds = $procIds | Sort-Object -Unique; foreach($procId in $procIds){ Stop-Process -Id $procId -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }; exit 0
